column4: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=303438 (try pressing alt+f2 and search panel and run it)
alt-f2 doesn't do anything, in fact none of my old shortcut keys seem to work
did you try restarting the system a few times? seems like something didnt load properly
for example i had Control-ALT-t bound to open a gnome-terminal but now it says it can't even locate the command 'gnome-terminal' anymore!
